task.title: Import TMX
task.shortdesc: Steps for importing TMX files into a translation memory using RemoteTM's web interface.

context.p: RemoteTM translation memories can be populated with data from TMX files either using Swordfish, its REST API or RemoteTM's own web interface. Using RemoteTM's web interface is faster.

step.cmd: Select a memory on the main list by clicking on it.
Click the Import TMX button on the main toolbar.
step.stepresult: The Import TMX dialog appears: Import TMX Dialog

step.cmd: Drag a TMX file from your computer and drop it on the top area of the Import TMX dialog. Alternatively, click on the Select File link to open a dialog for selecting a file from your computer.
Optionally, type a project description in the Project text input.
Optionally, type a subject for the TMX data in the Subject text input.
Optionally, enter a client name in the Client text box.

taskbody.result: RemoteTM uploads the selected TMX file and starts importing its data into the selected memory. On completion, an email with import results is sent to the user.
